===Page Speed Command-Line Utilities===

Currently Windows-only

  * har_to_pagespeed: Run Page Speed on a HAR file. [http://page-speed.googlecode.com/files/har_to_pagespeed.exe Windows]
  * pagespeed_optimize_image: Page Speed image optimizer for PNG, GIF, and JPG (converts GIF to PNG). [http://page-speed.googlecode.com/files/pagespeed_optimize_image.exe Windows]

===Page Speed SDK===

_NEW!_ Download the Page Speed SDK for Windows and Linux: [http://page-speed.googlecode.com/files/page-speed-1.7.zip page-speed-1.7.zip]

Also see EmbeddingPageSpeed.

*Linux*

{{{
unzip page-speed-1.7.zip
cd page-speed-1.7
make
}}}

*Windows*

Windows users need to download the Page Speed SDK Windows dependencies: [http://page-speed.googlecode.com/files/page-speed-windeps.zip page-speed-windeps.zip]. This zip file contains static libraries for zlib, libpng, and libjpeg.

Unzip page-speed-1.7.zip, then unzip page-speed-windeps.zip in the page-speed-1.7 directory (the directory that contains directories named pagespeed, base, build, third_party, etc). This will overlay the required dependencies into the Page Speed SDK build tree.

Open pagespeed.sln and build.
